plot: The curse of the headless horseman is the legacy of the small town of Sleepy Hollow. Spearheaded by the eager Constable Ichabod Crane and his new world ways into the quagmire of secrets and murder, secrets once laid to rest, best forgotten and now reawakened, and he too, holding a dark secret of a past once gone.

m.role: Non-Action Guy: Ichabod. He then later becomes an Action Survivor.

f.role: Blondes are Evil: Lady Van Tassel.
Katrina practices witchcraft, since she is seen making a potion and chanting a spell when Ichabod fell ill. She goes more for a mix of Cute Witch and Dark Magical Girl.
Dark Magical Girl: Katrina has strong whiffs of this trope as well, what with her enigmatic yet kind presence.

Hot Witch: Ichabod's mom, although her status as a witch is debatable. She was associated with magic. Lady Van Tassel is an evil example. She's very attractive and a mistress of black magic. Katrina practices witchcraft, since she is seen making a potion and chanting a spell when Ichabod fell ill. She goes more for a mix of Cute Witch and Dark Magical Girl.

Sleepy Hollow:
 Katrina Van Tassel. She is the beauty of Raven Hair, Ivory Skin variety and her cleavage was quite revealing. The patterns she was drawing on the floor were protection runes. She is a good and beautiful witch.
Ms. Fanservice: Christina Ricci is absolutely smoking hot in this film. She's not a filler character, but her deep cleavage makes her fit the trope.
The Ingenue: Katrina, despite Christina Ricci being mostly known for playing dark-haired creepy kids and vamps.
The Vamp: Lady Van Tassel, who manages to seduce Reverend Steenwyck into her service.

Sleepy Hollow has  Lady Von Tassell, who offs her husband and tries to off her stepdaughter, the local weird girl Katrina, in order to inherit the family fortune. She's also implied to have killed the first wife while posing as her nurse.
Wicked Stepmother: Lady Van Tassel to Katrina.
Wicked Witch: Subverted with the Witch of the Western Woods, who looks like wicked but just wants to help.

similar.name: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

name: Sleepy Hollow
